title: Ticket #969: startd crashes when running hawkeye modules on ia64_sles_8
description:
nmi-0025:/home/condor # condor_version $CondorVersion: 7.4.1 Nov 10 2009 BuildID: 195469 PRE-RELEASE $ $CondorPlatform: IA64-LINUX_SLES81 $

On this platform and build, even the most basic hawkeye modules crash the startd. This seems to only occur if the startd is launched by the master. i.e., launching condor_startd daemon manually from a shell or gdb seems to work fine
remarks:
2009-Nov-17 13:00:27 by griswold:
wow that was awful 

-- ex condor config
MODULES = $(LOCAL_DIR)/hawkeye_modules
STARTD_CRON_NAME = NMIPOOL
NMIPOOL_JOBLIST = test

NMIPOOL_TEST_PREFIX =
NMIPOOL_TEST_EXECUTABLE = $(MODULES)/test.sh
NMIPOOL_TEST_PERIOD = 1h
NMIPOOL_TEST_KILL = True

-- test.sh
#!/bin/sh

echo 'abc = "2"'
echo --

2010-Mar-17 14:32:40 by psilord:
Since the platform for this ticket is out of NMI, I don't have any way to test this, and it works everywhere else, I'm abandoning this ticket.

I'm not resolving it because no work was done and the problem was not understood.

If it crops up again, I'm sure this ticket will be revised or a different ticket will be made.
creator: psilord
